title: Outfit
description: Outfit aims to be a modern, clean easy to use retail clothing site. Featuring a simple & easy to navigate UI.

This fully functional e-commerce front end aims to replicate many popular e-commerce clothing sites and implements a variety of features including favourites list as well as fully functional shopping cart & payment screens.
The UI contains a highly responsive custom built theme, which is adaptive to many major devices.

title: Damians' Hairdressing
description: This single page website demonstrates the tools & features employed on a fully responsive business website. The project aims to project a modern and user friendly UI to display business information, news and contact details in a clear and purposeful fashion.
The project is fully responsive to most major devices allowing for an adaptive experience.

title: Meal Mate
description: Meal Mate is a web application which aims to provide users with recipe suggestions. The app uses 'The MealDB' API in order to display meal recipes based on search term or filtered option.

Users query the API by providing or selecting a main ingredient. Users can also maintain a list of favourite recipes for consideration using the favourite feature without the need for registering an account.

title: The Movie DB
description: The Movie Database enables users to search for movies and TV Shows.

This single page web application employs the use of 'TMDB' (The Movie Database) API to populate movies and TV Shows. The user is able to search for content either by entering a search query or by filtering data based on catgeory.
Hovering over each movie entry displays the description. The Movie Database API allows users to locate & explore new movies/genres without the need for an account.
This application could be further enhanced to incorporate user accounts to allow users to store favourites & rate movies.
